def has_remote_control_on_surface(surface:item):
    # Function to check if a remote control is on a specified surface
    symbol has_remote_control=exists o: item : is_remote_control(o) and on(o, surface)
    return has_remote_control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists surface: item : surfaces(surface) and has_remote_control_on_surface(surface):
            # Check if there is a surface with the remote control on it based on the available infor
mation
            bind surface: item where:
                surfaces(surface) and has_remote_control_on_surface(surface)
            # Select a surface that has the remote control on it
            achieve close_char(char, surface)
            # Move the character closer to the surface with the remote control

        else:
            # If no surface with the remote control is found, initiate exploration to locate one
            foreach surface: item:
                if surfaces(surface) and not visited(surface):
                    # Check all unvisited surfaces
                    observe(surface,"Check for a remote control on the surface")
                    # Observe whether each surface has the remote control

def has_remote_control_close_to(char:item):
    # Function to check if the remote control is close to the character
    symbol remote_close=exists rc: item : is_remote_control(rc) and close_char(char, rc)
    return remote_close

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists rc: item : is_remote_control(rc) and close_char(char, rc):
            # If the remote control is already close to the character, no need to search further
            bind rc: item where:
                is_remote_control(rc) and close_char(char, rc)
            achieve visited(rc)

        else: 
           # Check all potential places for the remote control that have not been visited
            foreach rc: item:
                if is_remote_control(rc) and not visited(rc):
                    observe(rc,"Locate the remote control of the DVD player")

        achieve is_on(remote_control)
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
